events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the product has a visible scratch on the surface. I am really disappointed because I expected a perfect item.
The case has been categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's description of a scratched product.
The case was assigned to support agent Maria Lopez for further assistance regarding the reported product defect.
Hello! I’m Maria, and I’m here to help you with the scratch on your product. I’m sorry for this inconvenience.
Could you please send us a photo of the scratch and confirm if you want a replacement or a refund?
I have attached pictures of the scratched product. I would prefer a replacement since I really like the item.
Thank you for the photos. We will arrange a replacement shipment immediately at no extra cost to you.
Thanks for the quick response and the offer to send a replacement. That sounds perfect to me.
The replacement order has been placed and you will receive tracking details shortly. We hope this resolves your issue.
Just following up to ensure you have received the replacement and that everything is satisfactory with your new product.
The replacement arrived today and it's in perfect condition. I’m happy with how everything was handled.
Since the replacement has been received and you are satisfied, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about the support you received regarding the product defect.
I completed the survey and gave high ratings for the fast and helpful support. Thank you for resolving my issue.
The customer support case involving the scratched product has been archived following case closure and survey completion.
